name: phonebook-backend
description: simple backend for the phonebook app

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../the-phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && ls && cp -r build ../part3/Phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push -u origin main && npm run deploy

author: Javier Ramos
